name: Space Bot
description:
Risk of Rain meets Noita.

Space Bot is a strategic roguelite where your environment is fully desctructable, and out to get you. Travel with your friendly spaceship as you hunt for 'GELD' on far away and mysterious planets.



  • Procedural Planets Have a different experience each time you play with procedurally generated levels
  • Unique Enemies Fight increasingly difficult and creepy enemies as you rush to escape
  • Find Upgrades Increase your stats as your progress through the game. The better you play, the more upgrades you can use!



The longer you stay on a planet, the more enemies will appear and attack you. Try and get your Geld and get out!

Space Bot is currently in development by Incinious. Let me know your thoughts and suggestions on twitter @Incinious!


Inspiration for this game was drawn from:
  • OpenLiero-X
  • Motherload
  • Binding of Isaac
  • Risk of Rain
  • Terraria
  • Noita
